show_name: Tanoshii Moomin Ikka: Moomin Tani no Suisei (movie)
other_title: 楽しいムーミン一家 ムーミン谷の彗星 (Japanese)
plot: Unusual things have been happening in Moominvalley. Moomin, Sniff and Mee leave for the Observatory on the Lonely Mountains to confirm the Muskrat's words: a comet is about to hit Moominvalley and destroy everything. On the way they meet Snufkin, the Hemulen and the Snorks and experience many adventures.
ending_theme: "Kono uchuu he, tsutae tai" by Emiko Shiratori
